DOC.brief_summary: To assess steady state pharmacokinetics (PK), safety and tolerability between AVP-786 (deuterated [d6] dextromethorphan hydrobromide [DM]/quinidine sulfate [Q]) and paroxetine and between AVP-786 and duloxetine.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1, Drug Interaction Study Between AVP-786 and Paroxetine and Between AVP-786 and Duloxetine in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult males and females 18 50 years of age BMI 18 30 kg/m2 History or presence of significant disease History of substance abuse and/or alcohol abuse with the past 3 years Use of tobaccocontaining or nicotinecontaining products within 6 months Use of any prescription or the overthecounter medications within 14 days
